csts.​libs.​utils

Object that contains utility type functions for the CSTS

Functions
blob
blob(
mime,
content,
filename
)

This method will allow files to be saved from the CSTS app (file save dialog)

Parameters
mime

The mime type of the file to save

content

The data to be saved

filename

The name of the file to save asin

getGuid
getGuid()

Generates a GUID like string

getRecursiveDir
getRecursiveDir: (
d,
f,
s
) =>
Parameters
dir

The path being scanned

filelist

a file list to pass between recursive calls.  Not needed for initial call

log
log(
msg
)

Will log a message to the console if the application environment is set to developmental

Parameters
msg

A String or object to be logged

toggleHosts
toggleHosts()

Shows or hides the hosts column of the CSTS application
